about_the_game:
Explore the brightness and resilience of our main character: PogoGirl. Her ability to relentlessly bounce forever and not letting anything get her down was a great motivation to me while composing her songs. I hope this soundtrack can provide as much hope and positivity to you as it did to me.

This was such a fun ride to make and I hope you get a bunch of good feels and nostalgia from checking it out. Do let me know how you feel about the music, I'd truly love to hear from you! Also, go play the game, it's super chill and fun!

When you purchase the soundtrack, you can enjoy it in high quality audio! Both 320kbps MP3 and lossless FLAC formats are included. You also greatly support and encourage both Andrej (developer) and myself to keep doing what we are doing!

name: Go! Go! PogoGirl Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 57 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 240 MB available space

short_description: Explore the brightness and resilience of PogoGirl!
